Class JavaActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
      • eg.projects.JavaActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, ProjectActions

    public class JavaActions
extends ProjectConfig
implements ProjectActions
    Represents a programming project in Java
